channel.title: Jason Fuchs on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jason Fuchs on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘My Hero Academia’ Live-Action Movie Nabs ‘Welcome to Derry’ Co-Creator as Writer (Exclusive)
item.description: Filmmaker Shinsuke Sato, known for his numerous manga adaptations such as “Bleach” and “Kingdom,” remains attached to direct the feature from Netflix and Legendary.
